name: .LNK File Extension
summary: Learn about .LNK files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: Opening an LNK file, by double-clicking it or right-clicking it and selecting Open, opens the file, folder, or program to which the LNK file points. Advanced users can edit an LNK file's properties by right-clicking the file and selecting Properties.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Parallels Desktop for Mac with Windows installed
